description: Lanka Milk Foods (CWE) PLC Vs B. K. Prabath Chandrakeerthi and 02 Others before Wickum A. Kaluarachchi, J.
parties: Lanka Milk Foods (CWE) PLC Vs B. K. Prabath Chandrakeerthi and 02 Others
keywords: Effect of a typographical error in the Affidavit to its validity. -Laches. -Ultra Vires. -Illegality. -Rules of Natural Justice. -Fair and Proper Inquiry. -Whether matters related to gratuity and wages could be decided in one inquiry before the Commissioner of Labour.
